backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for the Valentine UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of key frontend files including App, styles, Tailwind config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component showing an envelope that reveals a styled Valentine letter when clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Valentine-themed stylesheet defining OKLCH colors, fonts, base styles, and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theming, color palettes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a Valentine letter web page, including schema info, existing features, and a pending feature request.
